attributes.action: SI Games forcing people to download alternative software to play Football Manager 2012.
attributes.additional_details:
SI Games are well known for selling the "Football Manager" games.

As of 16th September 2011 the company are saying all the customer must now download alternative software called "Steam" in order this game.

This is not fair on those who do not have a internet connection. This isnt just for the game its a breach of rights.

The aim is to let everyone have equal rights again.

NOT everyone has the internet.
